resources.string: TV and Mobile should be on same wifi network
MiracastDisplay should be enabled on the TV
Click \'start\' and make sure wireless display option is enabled
Your wifi connection is disabled. Please connect turn on wifi from your phone to connect with your TV
Sorry, Your phone\'s wifi connection is disabled. To use this app, please turn on your phone\'s wifi connection.
Thanks for using this app. Please take a moment to rate it.
Please click BACK again to exit
Please help us to improve the app by giving 5 star rating.
Screen mirroring requires your phone and target device to connect to the same Wifi.
To get connected Wifi name, Please turn on location and grant permission, Thank you.

Privacy Policy for tv cast ultimate
This privacy policy governs your use of the software application tv cast ultimate ("Application") for mobile devices that was created by Star tm. The Application is a web browser which allows you to send videos to various streaming devices.
What information does the Application obtain and how is it used?
We do not collect personally identifiable information about you. In other words, we do not collect information such as your name, address, phone number or email address.
We do not knowingly contact or collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have inadvertently collected such information, please contact us so we can promptly obtain parental consent or remove the information.
In addition, the Application may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device you use, your mobile devices unique device ID, the IP address of your mobile device, your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browsers you use, and information about the way you use the Application.
This Application does not collect precise information about the location of your mobile device however you may allow individual websites to access your location.
